com.concordium.sdk.types

Class ConversionResult<Type>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordium.sdk.types.ConversionResult<Type>

  • public class ConversionResult<Type>
extends Object
    For representing fractions with large numerators or denominators. Used in CurrencyConverter to convert to/from CCDAmount and Energy. Use asBigDecimal(int) to get numeric value of the fraction. Type parameter prevents faulty usage of conversion functions in CurrencyConverter.

      Phantom type for ConversionResult indicating the result represents an amount of Euros
      static class  ConversionResult.microCCD
      Phantom type for ConversionResult indicating the result represents a CCDAmount.
      static class  ConversionResult.NRG
      Phantom type for ConversionResult indicating the result represents an amount of Energy

      • asBigDecimal

        public BigDecimal asBigDecimal(int precision)
        Get the fraction as a BigDecimal value with the specified amount of precision i.e. the specified amount of decimal points. Result is rounded using RoundingMode.HALF_UP
        Parameters:
        precision - how many decimals of precision.
        Returns:
        the fraction represented as a BigDecimal.

      • asBigDecimal

        public BigDecimal asBigDecimal(int precision,
                               RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Get the fraction as a BigDecimal value with the specified amount of precision i.e. the specified amount of decimal points. Result is rounded using the provided RoundingMode.
        Parameters:
        precision - how many decimals of precision.
        roundingMode - the RoundingMode to use.
        Returns:
        the fraction represented as a BigDecimal.

      • mult

        public <T extends ConversionResult.ConversionResultType> ConversionResult<T> mult(ConversionResult<?> other)
        Multiplies ConversionResults. Calculates a*c/b*d for input a/b, c/d.

      • div

        public <T extends ConversionResult.ConversionResultType> ConversionResult<T> div(ConversionResult<?> other)
        Divides ConversionResults. Calculates a*d/b*c for input a/b, c/d.
